problem_text: Given that the perimeter of \triangle A B C = 25, find x. Assume that segments that appear tangent to circles are tangent.
compact_text: Given that the perimeter of \triangle ABC = 25, find x. Assume that segments that appear tangent to circles are tangent.
annotat_text: Given that the perimeter of $\triangle A B C=25,$ find $x$. Assume that segments that appear tangent to circles are tangent.
